title: Will the samsung white skins come out this year 2016 ?
body: I was wondering if the Samsung White skins would make an appearance during this years World championship I really badly want SSW {{champion:412}}

replies.body: Unfortunately, I don't have any details on upcoming events or content.  Your best bet would be to bookmark the [Sales](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) page to stay up to date.  Fingers crossed!
